prologue.dc:title: CMIP6 Data Request Supplement [01.00.30beta1]
prologue.dc:description: The CMIP6 Data Request will specify the variables requested for the CMIP6 archive, and the detail the experiments and time slices for which they are required.
prologue.dc:creator: Martin Juckes
prologue.dc:source: CF Standard Name table; CMIP6 Controlled Vocabularies; ESDOC CMIP6 Experiment Documentation

item.comment: CMIP5 values too restricted: thickness can include ridges, 200m
item.label: SImon-sithick
item.title: Guide ranges for sithick (table SImon)

item.comment: CMIP5 values too limited: expanded here.
item.label: Amon-rsds
item.title: Guide ranges for rsds (table Amon)

item.comment: One CMIP5 model is an outlier in mean abs values, being a factor 1000 out: a clear scaling error. Many models exceed the CMIP5 max: relaxed significantly to allow for further increase in modelled convective activity
item.label: Amon-prc
item.title: Guide ranges for prc (table Amon)

item.comment: CMIP5 values too limited: expanded here.
item.label: Amon-rsuscs
item.title: Guide ranges for rsuscs (table Amon)

item.comment: CMIP5 values too restrictive .. resolution dependent extremes expected .. generous extension of range
item.label: Amon-uas
item.title: Guide ranges for uas (table Amon)

item.comment: CMIP5 table max/min values OK apart from one outlier; mean abs values too tight
item.label: Amon-huss
item.title: Guide ranges for huss (table Amon)

item.comment: All models in CMIP5 range, but close to max: relaxed slightly
item.label: Amon-prw
item.title: Guide ranges for prw (table Amon)

item.comment: CMIP5 models all consistent; several exceed CMOR table max;
item.label: Amon-prsn
item.title: Guide ranges for prsn (table Amon)

item.comment: Only 3 models .. positive definate in CMIP5, but may turn negative in CMIP6
item.label: Amon-fco2antt
item.title: Guide ranges for fco2antt (table Amon)

item.comment: CMIP5 table values OK, but expanded slightly here to allow for greater spatial and scenario variability
item.label: Amon-pr
item.title: Guide ranges for pr (table Amon)

item.comment: CMIP5 values OK .. abs range tightened slightly
item.label: Amon-ps
item.title: Guide ranges for ps (table Amon)

item.comment: Relaxed mean abs slightly
item.label: Amon-rlds
item.title: Guide ranges for rlds (table Amon)

item.comment: CMIP5 values too restrictive .. resolution dependent extremes expected .. generous extension of range
item.label: Amon-vas
item.title: Guide ranges for vas (table Amon)

item.comment: CMIP5 values OK: one model has clear outliers not picked up by the limits: could be tightened?
item.label: Amon-psl
item.title: Guide ranges for psl (table Amon)

item.comment: Physical upper bound near 100, but many exceptions in CMIP5
item.label: Amon-hur
item.title: Guide ranges for hur (table Amon)

item.comment: One model family in CMIP5 (NASA-GISS) has substantially larger values than all others. Broad limits set here to encompass all values.
item.label: Amon-sbl
item.title: Guide ranges for sbl (table Amon)

item.comment: CMIP5 values too limited: expanded here.
item.label: Amon-rtmt
item.title: Guide ranges for rtmt (table Amon)

item.comment: Convection can occur at any level in the atmosphere.
item.label: Amon-cct
item.title: Guide ranges for cct (table Amon)

item.comment: Two models (one institution) in CMIP5 were under this valid_min, but acknowledged this as an error.
item.label: Amon-rsutcs
item.title: Guide ranges for rsutcs (table Amon)

item.comment: Maximum in CMIP5 archive 28 ... but resolution dependent.
item.label: Amon-sfcWind
item.title: Guide ranges for sfcWind (table Amon)

item.comment: CMIP5 values exceeded ... appear to have been too restrictive
item.label: Amon-tauv
item.title: Guide ranges for tauv (table Amon)

item.comment: CMIP5 values exceeded ... appear to have been too restrictive
item.label: Amon-tauu
item.title: Guide ranges for tauu (table Amon)

item.comment: CMIP5 values too limited: expanded here.
item.label: Amon-rsus
item.title: Guide ranges for rsus (table Amon)

item.comment: Two models (one institution) in CMIP5 were under this valid_min, but acknowledged this as an error.
item.label: Amon-rsut
item.title: Guide ranges for rsut (table Amon)

item.comment: Convection can occur at any level in the atmosphere.
item.label: Amon-ccb
item.title: Guide ranges for ccb (table Amon)

item.comment: Clear bounds in CMIP5, with clear scaling and masking errors; ok_min_mean_abs set to rule out (1) scaling by 0.001 and (2) setting 0 over land.
item.label: Omon-sos
item.title: Guide ranges for sos (table Omon)

item.comment: Should scale as the square of so.
item.label: Omon-sossq
item.title: Guide ranges for sossq (table Omon)

item.comment: CMIP5 values too restricted: thickness can include ridges, 200m
item.label: SIday-sithick
item.title: Guide ranges for sithick (table SIday)

item.comment: Clear bounds in CMIP5, with clear scaling and masking errors; ok_min_mean_abs set to rule out (1) scaling by 0.001 and (2) setting 0 over land.
item.label: Odec-sos
item.title: Guide ranges for sos (table Odec)

item.comment: Clear bounds in CMIP5, with clear scaling and masking errors; ok_min_mean_abs set to rule out (1) scaling by 0.001 and (2) setting 0 over land.
item.label: Oday-sos
item.title: Guide ranges for sos (table Oday)

item.comment: Should scale as the square of so.
item.label: Oday-sossq
item.title: Guide ranges for sossq (table Oday)

item.comment: Physical upper bound near 100, but many exceptions in CMIP5
item.label: day-hur
item.title: Guide ranges for hur (table day)

item.comment: Reasonably well bounded, apart from one model, but noisy.
item.label: day-hus
item.title: Guide ranges for hus (table day)

item.label: fx-sftgif
item.title: Fraction of Grid Cell Covered with Glacier

item.label: Omon-zostoga
item.title: Global Average Thermosteric Sea Level Change

item.label: Omon-htovgyre
item.title: Northward Ocean Heat Transport due to Gyre

item.label: Omon-htovovrt
item.title: Northward Ocean Heat Transport due to Overturning

item.label: Omon-prsn
item.title: Snowfall Flux where Ice Free Ocean over Sea

item.label: Lmon-mrsos
item.title: Moisture in Upper Portion of Soil Column

item.label: LImon-sbl
item.title: Surface Snow and Ice Sublimation Flux

item.label: degckgpm2
item.title: Degree Celsius kilograms per square meter

item.label: mjpms
item.title: Million Joules per meter per second

item.label: m4ps
item.title: Meters to the fourth per second

item.label: kgpm2s
item.title: Kilograms per meter squared per second

item.label: molpm3s
item.title: Tendency of moles per cubic meter
